name: The Maze (itch) (cwbgamestudio)
description:
"Oliver is a boy who didn't remember his mother's teachings and made the wrong choice, in the labyrinth he understands that his choices have consequences."

Goals:
Collect the memories and enter on the void to discover their story.

Skills:
B → Void, back.

Select → Run 

Controls on Desktop;
Up - Up Arrow / W
Down - Down Arrow / S
Left - Left Arrow / A
Right - Right Arrow / D
A - Alt / Z / J
B - Ctrl / K / X
Start - Enter
Select - Shift

Source Code / @instagram
